msbt.message:
Oh, hey! Is that the
I gave you, ?!YAAAY! You look très fab in that! You are totes WEARING it! I'm so glad I made you look so good!
HAAAAANG ON! Is that the I gave you?! Ohmigosh! ! You are looking so WOW!<10_4 /> I'm kind of jealous, !

That is SO YOU, it should be arrested for identity theft!You're right. What I just said didn't make sense at all, !I love dressing up, but making others look good is, you know, how I make the world a better place!

Hi, bestie! That's the
I gave you, right? You look, like, PERFECTION! My claim to the title of island fashionista is secure, !
Your is, ohmigosh, PERFECT!Wow! My skills in giving you fashion gifts are just the fabbest, huh?

SQUEEE! You're wearing the
I gave you! Ego boost!I knew you'd look amazing, but I didn't know you'd look fantastamazing!
Wow, ! Your ? Totes très chic!
Your ? AMAZING! Your head was built to make fashion look fashionable!
That gives me LIFE! You are a Fashion Master, !
Your ? SO adorbs!Accessories TOTES make a plain old ensemble an Ensémblé.
Your is a trendy accent for your outfit! You are legit super great at this whole accessory thing, !
Your ! SO chic! I could just scream, !I'm not going to. But I could. Your style is totes that great!
! Your look amazing on you!Are you trying to become a model?
! Your are SO fabtaculous! What can I say? I really love a kickin' pair of kicks!
Ohmigosh, you designed that yourself, ?! No wonder I felt runway vibes!It's legit fab that you made your own thing instead of buying off the shelf!
Your outfit is totally WOW. Where did you GET IT?WHAT?! GET. OUT! designed it?! I had no idea they were so gifted! I wonder if they'd make a design for me?

Your outfit is très unique— where'd you get it?Shut. Up. ?! From ?! Designed it?! For reals?!Are they trying to become a designer? Because I will buy totes everything if they open a store!LEGIT. EVERYTHING.
Your is SO in season, I might EXPLODE!For real, it SCREAMS "spring" at me so loud, I might ask it to stop!
LOVING the summer look, ! Especially your !Looking fab, but not being SO fab folks are intimidated? That's what being a fashion icon is all about!
I just love fall clothes! The colors, the layeringit's like a painting, you know?That's why your is totes museum worthy!
Your is SO winter chic! I. LOVE. IT!This weather needs fashion that's cute AND functionalthe same two words I'd use to describe you!
Are you cold?! You're wearing soooo many layers!Just don't, you know, overheat? Or, um, undercool'K?
! Aren't you FREEZING?!I mean, I've made sacrifices to look trendy too Just don't, you know, freeze because of it?
The you're wearing today is SOOOO. ADORBS.You're hitting a fashion home run in my heart right now.I don't know if that's the right golf termbut it's true.
!Cute outfits like that are totally my fave—and, legit, you make it look cuter than cute, !I bet you could pull off anything from cute looks to daring heists! I call dibs on being your accomplice.
OK, your outfit right now? It's literally the cutest. Especially !So when you see me in the same thing, I'm not copying. It's totes an homage, !

Wow! Check out in that .You are way beyond-the-moon cool. Straight full zappo, thought dog! I'm talking full-on piano farm, boop!You look confused Listen. I'm a trendsetter. And I'm setting new slang trends.I KNOW it won't all slapclob right away, you zeep?
Your !You have SUCH a vibe going right now, . How can I describe it You look like you know stuff that I don't knowbut you don't care that I don't know it! That's SO cool.
Whoa. You are straight up owning that look, ! I mean !It's likethe whole outfit is a little bit extra, but not mega extra. Just cool or something. Yeah, cool!
You are totes pulling off that !You're too fab, . I've watched le many videos on fashion. I know everything. And this thing you've got going on right now? Somebody should give you an award, .

No way! No fair! You just come strolling on through, wearing It's super, mega, mondo hard to pull off such a simple look! But here you are, FULLY rocking it.You're sooo charismatic. Be careful with that superpowerand promise to never use it for evil, 'K?

Ugh, I totes get it. Keeping up with the latest fashion trends can be so whatever sometimes!That's why it's sooo couture to have a simple, go-to look ready. Like your !It's, like, a life hack. Remind me why I don't have a whole book of these published already, !
Wow! Looking fab with your , !
!That's such a great look on you, . You stand out!I'm lucky—I naturally stand out. Heads are always turning my way especially after I yell, "LOOK AT ME!"
Whoa, you're SUPER flashy today! I'm high-key jealous of your !At least I'll be able to pick you out of a crowd if I need to. Your total fabulosity is like a strobe light!
Check out your glam !Maybe I'll buy something like that for when I try to practice dancing or think about going jogging.
Nice !You look ready to MOVE! So active! So physical! So sweaty. So tiredWhoa. I got a workout just looking at you, !
Oh! Are you subbing in for my rhythmic-dodgeball instructor today, ?Sorry! It's just that you looked très sporty in your spicy little .
Your is so elegant I could die! It looks SO good on you. What are you all dressed up for? Going somewherele schmancy?

Ohmigosh! You look so elegant! And I totes know why. It has to be your !Super fancy. Fabulously schmancy. I'm nervous just standing near you!I'll just have to act as elegant as thou. Thee? Thy? Aw, forget it. Fancy stuff is too confusing, .

Ohmigosh. I can't stand how luxe your outfit is right now! It could LITERALLY be made of Bells.So spill the deets! What inspired the look, and where did you get ?Oh, never mind. I just want to stare at it some more!
You really do like your , huh? I see you wear it a LOT.
You must really, really, really, REALLY love that outfit, !I totes get it. Once I bought three of the same outfit so I could wear it all the time!
Weren't you wearing that the other day? So that's your style, huh?I totes love it! Not everybody can pull off wearing the same outfit every day, but you make it SING!
You wear that outfit so often, I'd expect it to be kind of grody!I bet you wash it every day, huh? I take good care of my fave clothes too.
That outfit, ? It is totes your signature outfit, isn't it? Sticking to one look and letting your threads define your "you"? What a couture thing to do.

Ohmigosh! Look at you! Now look at me! We, like, totes have the same adorbs vibe going on! I mean, I like your usual vibe too, but right now I feel soooo in sync with you. Aren't we just the cutest islanders EVER, ?
I'm, like, getting a lot of cat energy from you right nowOh, don't get me wrong, you look good! GREAT, even.I'm just saying, it makes me want to hug you. Cats are some of my besties, you know, .
Ohmigosh! Bunnnnyyyy Day! Your outfit has totes got me in the mood!Bunny Day outfits are just SO adorbs. I want to look like that all year long, !

UM. Why are you dressed like that?! Did you Without even telling me?! I'm SO jealous you're modeling for a wedding shoot! Offers like that should, like, come to ME, right? Ugh! Fiiine! I hate to admit it, but you look totes AMAZE right now, !

! You are looking FRESH today! Juicy is, like, the only word for it! Hold up. I NEED that look. Like, MUST have. Like, WILL get!Heeey, so, has anyone ever told you that imitation is the sincerest form of flattery, ?
Ooooh, ! You are looking even more adorbs than usual! It's because you look like a frog, obviously! But also, you totes wear frog chic like a pro. Are you SURE you weren't born in a pond, ?
Wow! You're looking waaaay froggy today, aren't you, ?It's not my thing, personally. But if anyone can pull it off, you can. Well, you and all the actual frogs.

Nice pirate getup! So, are you talking like a pirate as well as dressing like one? That's totes a thing, you know. "Aye, aye" means yes. "Ahoy" means hello. And "Arrrrr!" means, "Stop photo bombing my selfies!" See, it's way easy. You'll pick it up in no time, .

So, um, About that outfit of yoursIs the mermaid look IN right now? And if so, why didn't anyone tell ME, ? I'm the trendsetter around here! Me! How did I NOT know about this? Ugh, this whole thing is totes fishy.
CUUUTE! Look at you in your wet suit!I hope all the sea creatures you swim past in the ocean appreciate how well you wear it, !
LOVE the new look! It is très chic! Hmm, in factI know I'm, like, the trendsetter around here, but I'm going to make YOU my deputy trendsetter! What do you mean? It is totes a real thing, .

I bet when you got dressed, you were like, "I am SO going to make jealous!" Well, it worked, . I am WAY jelly!It's like your look is straight out of some epic adventureand I want to be the star of that adventure!
Ooooh! Your outfit The colors and patterns are AMAZE, !If I don't stop staring at them, I'm totes going to get hypnotized!

Can you guess who looks TOTES great today? BZZT! Time's up.The answer isyou! And it's obvious why. You look like me today!You should keep this outfit in your rotation. Then we can be matchy- matchy all the time, !
Whoa! There's something super, SUPER cool about you today What could it be?Is there an extra spring in your step? Are you just hoppy to be here?Or maybe you're just having an AWESOME hare day, !
O my G! Somebody is embracing their inner bear! You look great today, .What's that saying? Imitation is the most sincere form of sweet-talking? Well, it's totes true, obvs.
That's such a great outfit! You look ULTRA fab today, !There's just something about it I have a feeling you'd be GREAT at giving hugs today. Is that weird?

Ohmigosh! Check you out! You're almost as fluffy as me today, .Isn't it great to be covered in fluffy wool like this? Sooooo calmingWith both of us standing here, this is the fluffiest spot in all of —no contest!
Ohmigosh! You look GREAT today! Don't tell me you've ALWAYS been this fluffyAhh, I would LOVE to be wrapped in big, fluffy wool of my ownIt looks dangerously comfy! And I live for danger, .
Nice getup! Did your mom make that for you, ?Wait! That came out SUPER mean, but I totally meant it in a good way!I can feel the extra warmth and love from hereand I'm totes jealous!
Ohmigosh! Dodo Airlines merch?! That is super, SUPER cool!Those dodo bros have such a fab logo. It's better than high fashion— it's high-FLYIN' fashion!
WHOA! You're so festively frightful! Somebody's totes ready for a costume party.Wait, you're not going to one without me, are you? Because THAT would be scary, !
Uh, SANTA? Is that you?<10_4 /> Heeee! Just kidding. I could tell it was you, .Now if you really want to play up the Santa thing, you couldI dunno give me a gift or something

Ooh la la! Look at you! Your cutie level is off the charts today. If you weren't you, I'd think you were me.Let's see We're both adorable and charmingly coy, so it's def gotta be the outfit giving you an edge.GASP. Hold the phone. Does this make you my cutie rival?! If so, let the games begin, tee-hee!

That outfit is soyouthful! You're like an itty-bitty baby chick. Makes me want to rub your widdle head.No? Would that be weird? And a skosh belittling? Oh, fine. I totes won't. Just know you're THAT cute.
Ohmigosh! A kappa costume? That is SO unexpected. I can't stop smiling, . Mustlookaway.As a pop star, it's my duty to spread joy. My comedy chops are golden, but could I up my costume game?

Check out who's rocking the sleepy look. Spoilers—it's you! And strolling about like that? You're so FREE.As we both know, fashion NEVER sleeps, but sleepers should ALWAYS fashion. It's common sense, really.

Do I spy with my little eye something très magnifique? You're positively dripping in designer goods!I know Label's work when I see it. She's the bee's knees! If the bees were wearing pricey pants, that is.

This isn't a superstar sponsorship or anything, but the Nook Inc. items are surprisingly stylish, .Is Tom Nook secretly a fashionista?! Tee-hee, no way! Knowing him, he's probs besties with bigwig designers.

Your outfit is SO cute! I'm, like, almost jelly.Wait! I AM jelly! Are you off to a fancy tea party? Uh, like, without me?I mean, it's cool. It's just, you should invite me sometime. I can totes dress the part, .

Your outfit is amazing and, just, like, WONDERFUL.I have soooo much respect and admiration for folks who work at hospitals. I mean, really, it's more like you're wearing a superhero's outfit, you know?
Ohmigosh! That outfit! It's just sooo cuuute!You look like a doll that just, POOF! Magically came to life!Now, tell me the truth Do you live in a dollhouse too, ?

Ooh, are you training for something, ? You look like it.I do A LOT of training too, you know. Pop stars need stamina to do all that singing and dancing. Being a pop star is basically the same as being a marathon runner. Or so I've heard.
Two, four, six, eight, what do we appreciate?YOUR CHEERLEADING UNIFORM!!! Yeah, you are def winning with that outfit, .
The feather on your hat! You look SOwhat's the word?Dashing! That's it! Yeah, you look like you're ready to sweep someone off their feet! Oh! I didn't mean ME! But definitely someone, .
Whoaaaaa! Your visual-punk look is so, SO good! I may never get over it!This toootally backs up my favorite fashion principle: There is no such thing as too many buckles.
Wow! Look at you! Those are some BOLD fashion choices. The colors! The fit! Theeverything!I thought I was the top trendsetter on this island, but WOW. I am totes taking notes, .
Ooh! That outfit It's like I can feel positivity exploding out of you in every direction, !Seeing you rock that getup makes me feel like everything's going to be OK today. I'm not sure why!
Ooh! You went all out today, !Seeing you rock that animal-chic look is très inspiring! It's like I'm on a fabulous safari, .
AHEM, I'll take ultra-tasty with an extra side of LOVE, please!Heehee, seriously though, your apron is adorbs! Now I'm dying to eat your cooking Hint, hint.
Hello! Are you off on an adventure to explore uncharted corners of our island? Do tell, !No? Just walking around like that, then? Heehee, you really are a wild one, !

Once I find an outfit that's, like, perfect, I tend to keep wearing it.I mean, why would I not? Why mess with perfection, am I right?Anyway, I know you get me. I mean, you ARE wearing the same outfit as the last time I saw you. And you look just as amaze now as you did then, .
Seeing you wear that same outfit has made me want to wear it too!What's that called again? Subliminal messaging?<10_4 /> More like subliminal outfitting, !

Every single time I see you wearing that outfit, my brain screams, "CUUUUTE!" I wondercould I pull off that look too?Ohmigosh! Look at you shaping my fashion wants. I never knew you were such an influencer, .
WOW. What a makeover! You look SO stylish, .I should update my look too. I'm gonna contour my cheeks until they look sharp enough to slice cheese!
Wow! You're at PEAK FAB today. Are you testing a new look?You should have looped me in! We could have been twin BFFs— Bodaciously Fresh Fashionistas!

Hold it! Stop right there! Don't tell me You're trying out a new look, aren't you, ?AHA! I knew it. Detecting new looks is pretty much my superpower.The new you looks GREAT! Loop me in next time so I can sync up a style refresh of my own, !
